member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceClientExtensions.LoginAsync(Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Log a user into AppService based app given a provider name.
member.param: The AppServiceClient instance to login with.
Provider specific extra parameters that are sent as query string parameters to login endpoint.

Indicates that single sign-on should be used. Single sign-on requires that the application's Package SID be registered with the AppService gateway, but it provides a better experience as HTTP cookies are supported so that users do not have to login in everytime the application is launched.
member.returns: Task that will complete when the user has finished authentication.
